org.pikater.web.vaadin.gui.server.components.upload

Interface IFileUploadEvents

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    UserUploads

    public interface IFileUploadEvents
    Interface useful to implement if you wish to:
    • allow the user to continue browsing even before all uploads finish,
    • unbind handling of the uploaded file from Vaadin (allowing the user to log out or switch views before the actual handling finishes).
    THE PROBLEM: All parent components or UIs of upload buttons created with the createUploadButton method has to be attached for as long as an upload is in progress, otherwise the upload is interrupted and fails.

    THE SOLUTION: don't detach the parent components, only hide them in the uploadStarted(com.vaadin.server.StreamVariable.StreamingStartEvent) method, e.g. setVisible(false).
    Author:
    SkyCrawl
